    • Method Detail

      • uncaughtException

        public void uncaughtException(java.lang.Thread t,
                     java.lang.Throwable e)
        Disable the thread and add a stall array entry for the agent thread. Normal queue threads will time out, nothing more we can do here.
        Specified by:
        uncaughtException in interface java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
        Parameters:
        t - Thread that had the exception
        e - Throwable the exception
